title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 551.4 - Fees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 551.4 - Fees

State Regulations
(a) Unless
otherwise prescribed by statute, there shall be no fee charged for: (1)
inspection of records; (2)
search for records; or
(3)
any certification pursuant to this

Subpart. (b) Unless
otherwise prescribed by statute, copies of records will be furnished upon
payment of the fee prescribed by section
87
of the

Public Officers Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
551.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
